distanceSales.title: Distance Sales Agreement
distanceSales.intro: This Distance Sales Agreement regulates the rights and obligations of the parties regarding the sale of event tickets through the PULSE platform, within the scope of Consumer Protection Law No. 6502 and the Distance Contracts Regulation.
distanceSales.section1Content:
SELLER:
Company Name: PULSE Event Technologies Inc.
Address: Levent Mah. BÃ¼yÃ¼kdere Cad. No:123, BeÅŸiktaÅŸ/Ä°stanbul
Phone: +90 212 000 00 00
Email: info@pulse.com.tr
Registration No: 0000000000000001

BUYER:
The personal information declared during the ticket purchase process is valid.
distanceSales.section2Content: The subject of this agreement is to determine the rights and obligations of the parties in accordance with Consumer Protection Law No. 6502 and the Distance Contracts Regulation regarding the sale and delivery of event tickets ordered electronically by the BUYER through the SELLER's PULSE platform.
distanceSales.section3Content: The ticket type, event name, date, venue, and price information selected during the ticket purchase process are specified on the order summary page. Service fees are included in ticket prices. All prices are in Turkish Lira (TL) and include VAT.
distanceSales.section4Content:
The BUYER acknowledges and declares that they have read and are informed about the basic qualities of the event ticket offered for sale on the PULSE platform, the sales price, payment method, and preliminary information regarding delivery, and that they have given the necessary confirmation electronically.

By confirming this agreement electronically, the BUYER confirms that they have obtained the address, basic features of the ordered products/services, price of the products/services including taxes, and payment and delivery information completely and accurately.
distanceSales.section5Content:
Event tickets are delivered electronically (e-ticket) to the BUYER's specified email address and the 'My Tickets' section of their PULSE account after the purchase is completed. Tickets contain a QR code, and entry to the event is provided by scanning this QR code.

Physical ticket delivery is not applicable.
distanceSales.section6Content:
Payments are processed through a secure payment infrastructure protected by 256-bit SSL encryption. Credit card information is not stored by the SELLER; payment transactions are carried out through licensed payment institutions.

Accepted payment methods: Credit card, debit card, and virtual card.
distanceSales.section7Content:
In accordance with Article 15 of Law No. 6502 and Article 15 of the Distance Contracts Regulation, the right of withdrawal cannot be exercised in contracts for accommodation, transportation of goods, car rental, food and beverage supply, and leisure activities that must be performed on a specific date or period.

In this context, event tickets are excluded from the right of withdrawal. However, the SELLER may accept returns under certain conditions within the framework of its own cancellation and refund policy. Please review the Cancellation and Refund Policy page for details.
distanceSales.section8Content:
Consumer Arbitration Committees and Consumer Courts are authorized for disputes arising from this agreement. Monetary limits in applications are determined according to the values announced annually by the Ministry of Commerce.

The SELLER and the BUYER accept that the courts and enforcement offices of the Republic of Turkey are authorized for disputes arising from this agreement.
distanceSales.footer: This agreement comes into effect upon electronic confirmation by the BUYER. A copy of the agreement will be sent to the BUYER's registered email address.

kvkk.title: Privacy Policy (KVKK)
kvkk.intro: As PULSE Event Technologies Inc. ("PULSE" or "Company"), in the capacity of data controller within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ("KVKK"), we would like to inform you about the processing of your personal data.
kvkk.section1Content:
Your personal data will be processed by PULSE Event Technologies Inc. as the data controller within the scope explained below.

Address: Levent Mah. BÃ¼yÃ¼kdere Cad. No:123, BeÅŸiktaÅŸ/Ä°stanbul
Email: kvkk@pulse.com.tr
kvkk.section2Content:
Personal data collected through the platform includes:

â€¢ Identity Information: Name, surname, national ID number
â€¢ Contact Information: Email address, phone number, address
â€¢ Financial Information: Billing information, payment records
â€¢ Transaction Information: Purchased tickets, event preferences, order history
â€¢ Digital Data: IP address, cookie data, device information, session data
â€¢ Location Data: Location data used to show nearby events
kvkk.section3Content:
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

â€¢ Conducting event ticket sales and delivery processes
â€¢ Processing payments and issuing invoices
â€¢ Customer relationship management and providing support services
â€¢ Fulfilling legal obligations
â€¢ Ensuring platform security and preventing fraud
â€¢ Sending personalized event recommendations and campaign notifications
â€¢ Statistical analyses and platform development activities
kvkk.section4Content:
Your personal data may be shared with the following parties:

â€¢ Payment service providers (for processing payment transactions)
â€¢ Event organizers (for ticket verification and access control)
â€¢ Legal authorities (in case of legal obligation)
â€¢ Business partners and service providers (for conducting platform operations)

In case of transfer of your personal data abroad, the provisions of Article 9 of KVKK shall apply.
kvkk.section5Content:
Your personal data is retained for the duration required by the processing purposes and in accordance with legal retention obligations.

â€¢ Transaction data: 10 years from the transaction date (as required by Commercial Code)
â€¢ Invoice information: 10 years from the issue date (as required by tax legislation)
â€¢ Digital data: 2 years from the last transaction date
â€¢ Account information: 3 years from the account closure date
kvkk.section6Content:
Pursuant to Article 11 of KVKK, you have the following rights:

â€¢ To learn whether your personal data is being processed
â€¢ To request information if processed
â€¢ To learn the purpose of processing and whether they are used in accordance with the purpose
â€¢ To know the third parties to whom data is transferred domestically or abroad
â€¢ To request correction if data is incomplete or incorrectly processed
â€¢ To request deletion or destruction within the framework of Article 7 of KVKK
â€¢ To request notification of correction/deletion/destruction to third parties
â€¢ To object to any adverse result arising from the analysis of processed data exclusively through automated systems
â€¢ To claim compensation for damages incurred due to unlawful processing
kvkk.section7Content:
You can contact us through the following methods to exercise your rights:

â€¢ Email: Written application with identity verification to kvkk@pulse.com.tr
â€¢ Mail: Wet-signed petition to Levent Mah. BÃ¼yÃ¼kdere Cad. No:123, BeÅŸiktaÅŸ/Ä°stanbul
â€¢ Registered Email: Via registered electronic mail to pulse@hs01.kep.tr

Applications will be concluded free of charge within 30 days at the latest. If the process requires an additional cost, the fee determined by the Personal Data Protection Board may be charged.
kvkk.footer: This privacy notice has been prepared within the scope of Article 10 of the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 and the CommuniquÃ© on the Procedures and Principles to be Observed in the Fulfillment of the Obligation of Information.

cancellation.title: Cancellation & Refund Policy
cancellation.intro: The cancellation and refund conditions for event tickets purchased through the PULSE platform are described below. Please read these conditions carefully before purchasing your ticket.
cancellation.section1Content:
Event tickets fall under the right of withdrawal exception within Article 15 of Consumer Protection Law No. 6502. However, PULSE prioritizes customer satisfaction and applies the following cancellation and refund policy.

Cancellation requests can only be made through the PULSE platform or by contacting our support team.
cancellation.section2Content:
â€¢ Cancellations made 7 or more days before the event: 100% of the ticket price is refunded.
â€¢ Cancellations made 3 to 7 days before the event: 50% of the ticket price is refunded.
â€¢ Cancellations made less than 3 days before the event: No refund is provided.
â€¢ The service fee (5% of the ticket price) is non-refundable under any circumstances.

Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 14 business days after the cancellation request is approved.
cancellation.section3Content:
For events cancelled by the organizer, the full ticket price (including service fee) is refunded. The refund process is initiated automatically and completed within 14 business days.

In case of event postponement:
â€¢ Your ticket remains valid for the new date.
â€¢ If the new date is not suitable for you, you can request a full refund within 7 days of the postponement announcement.
â€¢ If no refund is requested within 7 days, the ticket is considered valid for the new date.
cancellation.section4Content:
Purchased tickets can be transferred to another person up to 24 hours before the event date.

â€¢ Ticket transfer can be done from the 'My Tickets' section on the PULSE platform.
â€¢ The name, surname, and email information of the recipient is required for the transfer.
â€¢ The transfer process is free of charge.
â€¢ Refund requests for transferred tickets must be made by the new ticket holder.
cancellation.section5Content:
In case of event cancellation due to natural disasters, epidemics, war, terrorism, government decisions, or similar force majeure events, the full ticket price is refunded.

Refund periods may be extended in force majeure situations depending on the circumstances. PULSE will inform ticket holders as soon as possible in such cases.
cancellation.section6Content:
You can reach us through the following channels for your cancellation and refund requests:

â€¢ Email: support@pulse.com.tr
â€¢ Phone: +90 212 000 00 00 (Weekdays 09:00-18:00)
â€¢ Platform: You can create a cancellation request from the 'My Tickets' section of your account.

Your requests will be evaluated and finalized within 48 hours at the latest.
cancellation.footer: These cancellation and refund conditions have been prepared within the framework of Consumer Protection Law No. 6502 and related regulations. PULSE reserves the right to make changes to these conditions. Current conditions are always published on this page.
